actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 2×Claws and 1×Bite
Bite [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8)
Claws [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6)

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Bloodthirst: It is Berserk and Beings at or below half HP make Checks against it as if Vulnerable.
Grim Resurrection: It dies instantly if its original corpse is destroyed. If it drops to 0 HP and its original corpse is not destroyed, it vanishes in a puff of smoke and reappears in its church of origin in the next Scene at full HP.
